howItWorks.title: Your Journey with {{brand}}
howItWorks.subtitle: Follow a seamless three-step experience that takes you from acquiring HTTC to earning rewards on every adventure.

purchase.title: Purchase HTTC
purchase.item1: Buy HTTCoin on Raydium or Jupiter
purchase.item2: Store safely in Phantom or Solflare

book.title: Book Your Travel
book.item1: Use HTTC at partner hotels & airlines

destinations.title: {{brand}} Around the World
destinations.subtitle: Explore 50+ curated destinations where HTTCoin rewards unlock seamless bookings, exclusive perks, and instant payments. Filter by category, region, and readiness to plan your next journey.
destinations.discover: Discover where your travel rewards take you
destinations.ctaDescription: Submit a partnership inquiry and our integrations team will reach out with onboarding details.
destinations.formMessage: Tell us about your destination or travel service
destinations.acceptedNoteEnd: once this destination is marked as "Accepted".

roadmap.title: {{brand}} Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our journey to revolutionize travel payments worldwide

debit.title: The {{brand}} Debit Card
debit.subtitle: Spend your crypto anywhere, earn instant HTTC rewards, and unlock premium travel perks with zero conversion fees.

global.title: Global Acceptance
global.desc: Spend anywhere VISA is accepted across 200+ countries.

instant.title: Instant Conversion
instant.desc: HTTC auto-converts to local currency when you tap to pay.

cashback.title: Cashback
cashback.desc: Earn HTTC rewards instantly on every purchase worldwide.

fx.title: Zero FX Fees
fx.desc: Travel freely with no surprise international transaction fees.

contactless.title: Contactless Ready
contactless.desc: Works with Apple Pay, Google Pay, and wearable devices.

security.title: Security First
security.desc: Freeze cards instantly, biometric protection, 24/7 fraud monitoring.

balances.title: Crypto + Fiat Balances
balances.desc: Hold HTTC, SOL, and major fiat currencies in one dashboard.

perks.title: Exclusive Perks
perks.desc: Airport lounge access, travel insurance, and hotel upgrades.

step1.title: 1. Load HTTC
step1.desc: Top up directly from your wallet or DEX.

step2.title: 2. Spend Anywhere
step2.desc: Tap, swipe, or use mobile wallets globally.

step3.title: 3. Earn Rewards
step3.desc: Cashback in HTTC lands instantly in your account.

waitlist.title: Join the waitlist
waitlist.desc: Secure early access, exclusive perks, and beta testing invitations for the HTTCoin debit card.
waitlist.name: Name

faq.title: Debit card FAQ
faq.q2: Is it a debit or credit card?
faq.a2: It is a debit card powered by your HTTC balance.
faq.a3: Initial launch in EU, GCC, and North America.
faq.a4: Cashback is distributed instantly in HTTC to your wallet.
faq.a5: No annual fee for Standard. Premium tiers require staking.

partners.title: Building the future of travel together WITH {{brand}}

footer.brandTagline: Revolutionizing travel payments with cryptocurrency. Earn rewards on every journey.

news.title: Stay Updated
news.desc: Get the latest updates about HTTCoin launch and partnerships

security.title: Built on Security & Transparency
security.subtitle: Your trust is our priority. HTTCoin is designed with industry-leading security measures.
security.antiRugDesc: No minting after launch. Owner cannot change balances. Built for security from day one.
security.liquidityLockedDesc: LP tokens locked permanently. Verified on Solana blockchain for complete transparency.
security.auditReadyDesc: Code audited by leading security firms. Security report will be publicly available.
security.whitelistProtectionDesc: Malicious wallets blocked. Secure early-stage transfers with advanced protection.
security.transparentTokenomicsDesc: All allocations public. Vesting schedules enforced on-chain with full visibility.
security.communityGovernedDesc: Holder voting rights coming soon. Transparent decision making for the community.
security.contractNote: Contract and verification links will be available at launch

tokenomicsPage.subtitle: Designed for sustainable growth, real-world utility, and long-term rewards for travelers and holders alike.
tokenomicsPage.burnDescription: Deflationary design keeps supply scarce over time.
tokenomicsPage.securityDetails: Contract owner renounced · Minting disabled · Liquidity locked · Audit ready with third-party review.
